instruction: Compose a short story about a robot who is able to learn to do chores on its own.
output:
Once upon a time, there was a curious little robot named Fred who was determined to master the house chores. Everyday, Fred practiced and experimented with different housekeeping tasks, such as sweeping, mopping, and vacuuming. Eventually, he was able to do these chores with remarkable speed and efficiency.

The other robots in the house were jealous of Fred's newfound mastery. They started to challenge him to increasingly difficult tasks, and Fred eventually managed to surpass them all. Every day, Fred would clean, cook, and do laundry without help from anyone else.

In the end, Fred was able to do more than the other robots, and the humans in the house were amazed. They often complimented Fred's skill and ingenuity, and he became everyone's favorite helper around the house.
